summary: Based on Stona Fitch's novel, this is the story of a wealthy US businessman (Behr) whose brutal kidnapping and torture are streamed online as part of an ultra-violent reality TV show.
cast: Jason Behr|Emma Catherwood|Joe Ferrara|Jacques Kerr|Helen Mallon|Toby Marlow|Sean O'Kane|Ben Bradley
keywords: handsomeness|tortured prisoners|bare chested male|one word title|terrorist
title: Senseless. Privados del sentido
